narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection on the noncompliant items identified on the inspection report dated February 25,
2014.
The lion that was cited in 2.40 (b)(2) was evaluated by the attending veterinarian and a treatment plan was
developed. 
An environmental enrichment plan was developed and approved by the attending veterinarian for the ringtailed
lemurs cited in 3.81. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensees.
